purpose_text.para: Holds the lower 32 bits of the data that is stored by an ST64BV0, Single-copy atomic 64-byte EL0 store instruction.

reg_groups.reg_group: A group mapping that does not have a known primary

field_description.para: Accelerator Data field. Holds bits[31:0] of the data that is stored by an ST64BV0 instruction.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
